description:
Keroro decides to turn a bunch of animals human and try to get them to join his platoon.  This might seem like a good idea in theory, but they all have their own goals in life.  And some of them are hostile!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Doubutsu Taiin Daishuugou de Arimasu / Giroro Neko wa Iitai de Arimasu
Rassemblement de troupeau / Parole de chat !
ケロロ 動物隊員大集合 であります / ギロロ ネコは言いたい であります
